items.reply_draft:
I feel you â€” this kind of error is usually about permissions / install location / PATH / caches.
I summarized a step-by-step checklist (with common mistakes + fixes) here: https://mikann20041029.github.io/solve-multi-github-pages-404-not-found-202602280056/
If you can share OS + Node/npm versions and the exact command, it's easier to pinpoint.
